AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Light Destroyer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by the Blood Sharks, to quickly attack vulnerable targets at close range.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Hotrod
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by a Shark, but had a hobby of upgrading her own systems.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Ship Butcher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Sharks, to quickly attack vulnerable targets at close range. From the day she was activated, she was put to work butchering enemy ships for parts to add to herself.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Scout
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Sharks, who raised her in a youth program their dogma of propaganda and conquest.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Light Cruiser
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Sharks, to serve as a vanguard for their battlegroups.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Picket Ship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Sharks, to protect their battleships from enemy destroyers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Star Destroyer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was assembled in a Blood Shark orbital foundry, to quickly attack vulnerable targets at close range.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Prototype Gunboat
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by a Blood Shark senior scientist, as a research project.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Star Ship Butcher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by space Sharks, to quickly attack vulnerable targets at close range. From the day she was activated, she was put to work butchering enemy ships for parts to add to the armada.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Synthetic Soul Experiment
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was produced during a soul synthesis experiment in a Blood Shark lab. She is the persona of a ship that never actually existed. This frees he potential power level from some of the limitations of physical starships, but makes her psychic actualization somewhat unstable

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Star Destroyer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Sharks, in the style of a military star destroyer.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Space Picket Ship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Sharks, to protect their space battleships from enemy star destroyers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Light Star Destroyer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Blood Sharks, to quickly attack vulnerable targets at long range.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Space Shark Interceptor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built to hunt down fleeing enemies.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Ship Shredder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Sharks, to quickly attack vulnerable targets at medium range. From the day she was activated, she was put to work butchering enemy ships for parts to feed the war machine.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Murder Engine
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Blood Sharks, who infused her with their violent, racist dogma. "Human Extermination Protocol: functioning as intended."

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Battleship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Sharks, in the style of a military Battleship.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Gun Barge
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Sharks, to protect their battleships from enemy destroyers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Space Gunship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by space Sharks, to quickly attack vulnerable targets at long range.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Space Shark Ace Custom
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by a space Shark, as a personal vanity project.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Star Ship Shredder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Sharks, to quickly attack vulnerable targets at long range. From the day she was activated, she was put to work butchering enemy ships for parts to add to herself.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Fanatic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Sharks, who infused her with a radical ideology.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Star Cruiser
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Sharks, in imitation of the style of a military space gunship.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Space Shark Battleship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by Sharks,in imitation of the style of a military space battleship.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Builder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by the Blood Sharks, to serve as a construction platform.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Repair Ship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by the Blood Sharks, to serve as a ship repair platform.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Tugboat
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by the Blood Sharks, to serve as an assistant to larger ships, in port.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Supply Ship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by the Blood Sharks, to carry supplies and equipment for combat ships at sea.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Cargo Hauler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by the Blood Sharks, to carry supplies and equipment around their bases.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Cargo Hauler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by the Blood Sharks, to carry supplies and equipment around their bases.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Resource Trawler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by the Blood Sharks, to harvest natural resources for their war machine.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Space Constructor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was engineered by the Blood Sharks' space program, to construct orbital bases.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Repair Space Ship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was engineered by the Blood Sharks' space program, to serve as a mobile ship repair platform.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Orbital Booster
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by the Blood Sharks' space program, to help lift larger ships into orbit.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Supply Ship
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by the Blood Sharks, to carry supplies and equipment for combat ships at sea.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Space Shuttle
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by the Blood Sharks' space program, to carry supplies and equipment to their bases in orbit.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Space miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by the Blood Sharks, to carve up asteroids in deep space.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shark Light Destroyer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was built by the Blood Sharks, to quickly attack vulnerable targets at close range.
